name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Telegram Restrcted Content Downloader - TG Downloader

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A restricted content downloader for telegram or TG, use it to download image, video, sticker, audio, voice message

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With this extension, you can easily download restricted content in web.telegram.org with just one click. 🚀

Features:
1. Text, image, video,  audio, voice and stickers are supported. 📄📷🎥🎵
2. Tiny size  (less than 1 MB) & High performance & No data collecting. ⚡
3. Both Telegram A version and Telegram K version are supported. ✅
4. Download messages in both public and private channels. 🔓🔒
5. Human support. 👩‍💻👨‍💻

Basic Plan has limit of 3 download times per day. 📉
Premium Plan has NO limit forever. 📈

More features are on the way. 🚧

Feedback via https://t.me/+pHaZ8oHR-rZiZDI1 💬
